title: DiverseElders
subtitle: The Trump administration has reinterpreted a 2008 agreement with Vietnam in multiple ways to expand the categories of #refugees it can deport. title: UNHCR Thailand
subtitle:
Of the 7.1 million refugee children of school age, 3.7 million - more than half - do not go to school, UNHCR, the UN Refugee Agency, says in a report released today.

Read full report: http://unh.cr/5d68f83ede 
#Refugees #Education #ผู้ลี้ภัย #การศึกษาpic.twitter.com/hCHsRusYAq

title: UNHCR KENYA
subtitle:
While close to two-thirds of #Refugees children are enrolled in primary education, less than one-quarter of refugee adolescents make it to secondary.  

In #Dadaab, 60% of school aged children are enrolled in both formal and non-formal schools. https://twitter.com/UNHCR_Kenya/status/1167371189913882624 …pic.twitter.com/PHmqnUYMYP
